summary: This is a confidential communication from the Associate Warden at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York, dated August 14, 2019, regarding mandatory 30-minute rounds for inmate Jeffrey Epstein. It appears to be an internal directive or memo concerning his custody.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: He is the inmate (#76318-057) for whom mandatory 30-minute rounds are ordered.

events.title: MCC Directive for Epstein Monitoring
events.description: The Associate Warden at MCC New York issues a confidential directive mandating that rounds be conducted every 30 minutes for inmate Jeffrey Epstein.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York, 150 Park Row, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: The document is a confidential communication dated August 14, 2019, concerning inmate Jeffrey Epstein.
It mandates that rounds must be conducted every 30 minutes for Epstein (inmate #76318-057).
The directive originates from the Associate Warden at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York.
The document references a 'GODW' order as the basis for the mandatory rounds.
